3. An efflorescent compound is a substance that?
optionA: absorbs water froom the air without dissolving in i
optionB: is capable of giving off coloured luminosity
optionC: gives out water to the atmosphere
optionD: gives out its water of crystallization on heating
answer: gives out water to the atmosphere

question: 4. A molar solution of caustic soda is prepared by dissolving
optionA: 40 g NaOH in 100 g of water
optionB: 40 g NaOH in 1000 g of water
optionD: 20 g NaOH in 1000 g of solution
answer: 40 g NaOH in 1000 g of water
